com.software.reuze

Interface al_i_Learner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    al_CurrentBest, al_LearnerAdaBoost, al_LearnerDecisionList, al_LearnerDecisionTree, al_LearnerDecisionTreeStump, al_LearnerMajority, al_LearnerNeuralNetwork, al_LearnerWeightedMajority

    public interface al_i_Learner
    Describes a model for learning based on a set of examples; see page 693-694 in AIMAv3 for further explanation. This model does not specify the types of feedback (un-supervised, reinforcement, supervised) used to train the learner.
    Author:
    Ravi Mohan, Andrew Brown

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <E> E predict(al_Example example)
      Returns the outcome predicted for the specified example
      int[] test(al_Examples test_set)
      Returns the accuracy of the hypothesis on the specified set of examples
      void train(al_Examples training_set)
      Trains the learner given a set of examples

        Trains the learner given a set of examples

      • test

        int[] test(al_Examples test_set)
        Returns the accuracy of the hypothesis on the specified set of examples
        Parameters:
        test_set - the test data set.
        Returns:
        the accuracy of the hypothesis on the specified set of examples as an array like [#correct, #incorrect]
